name: Type or Die (lukebriggs)
description:
Made In 5 days for the Newcastle University Computing and Technology Society (NUCATS) Game Jam

You are about to experience the last moments of your life.

It is too late for others and your life will only be prolonged with the help of a complete stranger.

They will chase you down in all directions. You will be notified of what keys to press for each attacker.

Fight Like hell so no one else has to.
